title: Why doing a mix of exercise could be the key to longer life
description: Don't just focus on one activity - doing a variety every week gives you more health benefits, a study suggests.
content:
Don't put all your eggs in one basket when it comes to exercise - doing a variety of different physical activities every week is the key to boosting your health and living longer, a study suggests.

title: Sophie Turner on why being at your lowest is liberating
description: The Game of Thrones star is leaning into the role of a disgruntled office worker in new drama Steal.
content:
Game of Thrones star Sophie Turner says she "leaned into" playing a corporate worker who is at "rock bottom" in new Amazon Prime Video heist drama Steal.

title: Snap settles social media addiction lawsuit ahead of trial
description: TikTok, YouTube and Meta remain defendants in the case, which is due to kick off next week.
content:
Snapchat's parent Snap has settled a social media addiction lawsuit just days before the landmark case was due to go to trial in Los Angeles.
Terms of the deal were not announced as it was revealed by lawyers at a California Superior Court hearing, a... [1538 chars]

title: Gul Plaza: Survivors tell of Pakistan mall fire horror
description: The BBC speaks to eyewitnesses and survivors of the fire that ripped through a busy Pakistan shopping centre.
content:
Muhammed Amin is beside himself with grief and despair.
His brother, Naveed Memon, was inside Gul Plaza when a massive fire ripped through the densely-packed shopping centre in Pakistan's commercial capital, Karachi.

title: Voice of Hind Rajab director made film 'to bear witness' and 'not feel helpless'
description: Kaouther Ben Hani's Oscar hopeful, The Voice of Hind Rajab, tells the tale of a girl killed in Gaza.
content:
"They're shooting at me. Please come get me. I'm scared."
